about.info: The Cursed Land is a next-generation MMORPG that blends classic Web2 gameplay with Web3 ownership. Explore, fight monsters and players, join guilds, and earn real value through blockchain.

list.name: Hybrid Economy
list.desc: Play with both traditional Web2 items and Web3 NFTs. Classic items drop from monsters or quests and can be traded in-game or exchanged for Curse/TCL in Private Web3 Shops via xPortal. NFT items are on-chain assets that can be staked, traded, upgraded and backed by the TCL token.

list.name: Ways to Earn
list.desc: There are 6 main ways to earn TCL, including staking, quests, PvE/PvP, trading, referrals, and Play & Earn mechanics.

list.name: TCL Token
list.desc: The core of the game economy, used for staking, NFT minting, in-game purchases, and trading in Web3 Shops. TCL has staking rewards, burns, referrals, and a fluctuating APR.

list.name: Character Progression
list.desc: Current max level is 59, with plans to expand to level 100. Progress is permanent and items truly belong to the player.

list.name: Customization Systems
list.desc: Equip unique Armors, Weapons, Accessories. Add crystals for effects, refine accessories, and upgrade shields for race-based defensive bonuses.

list.name: Additional Features
list.desc: Fishing, Mining, secure Player Trading, Mail & Whisper, and item display in chat. Many secrets, alliances, and new challenges await.

races.info: Races define the appearance and origin of your hero. You may choose from Humans, Beasts, and Undead (male), or Elves (female). Every race can wield any class, creating limitless strategies and unique combinations.

list.name: Human
list.desc: Balanced and resilient, representing strength and versatility.

list.name: Beast
list.desc: Savage and instinctive, channeling primal power in combat.

list.name: Undead
list.desc: Immortal and unyielding, rising again to conquer death itself.

list.name: Elf
list.desc: Graceful and wise, masters of agility and mystical arts.

classes.info: Classes define your combat style. To unleash skills, you must equip the weapon bound to your class. However, you remain free to wield any weapon for creative battle strategies.

list.name: Assassin
list.desc: Specializes in Daggers. Deadly, fast, and precise. Requires Daggers for skills, but can wield any weapon.

list.name: Shaman
list.desc: Harnesses a Fan. Brings mystic power and support. Fan required for skills, but other weapons are possible.

list.name: Hunter
list.desc: Master of the Bow. Strikes enemies from afar. Requires Bow for skills, but versatile with any weapon.

list.name: Warrior (In Development)
list.desc: Will wield the Sword. A frontline fighter built for raw strength and resilience.

list.name: Wizard (In Development)
list.desc: Will command a Staff. A bearer of ancient magic, channeling devastating spells.

bonuses.info: Bonuses give additional stats to your equipment. They vary by item type (Weapon, Armor, etc.).

Weapon.info: Weapons can have offensive bonuses that increase damage.

Armor.info: Armor bonuses improve defense and survivability.

Bracelet.info: Bracelets grant mixed bonuses with survivability and utility.

Necklaces.info: Necklaces can shift stats between HP and MP while giving resistances.

Shoes.info: Shoes increase mobility and can add offensive or defensive stats.

Shield.info: Shields provide survivability and resistances against control.

Helmet.info: Helmets add utility and resistances while boosting combat stats.

Earrings.info: Earrings grant utility, mana regen and item drop chance.
